transport module¶

This module contains information about the asset.Asset that allows a person.Person to do the following:

  1. commute.Commute_To_Work
  2. commute.Commute_From_Work

activities. This module contains code for transport.Transport.

Module author: Dr. Namdi Brandon

class transport.Transport[source]¶

Bases: asset.Asset

This class is an asset that allows for commuting.

Activities in this asset:

  1. commute.Commute_To_Work
  2. commute.Commute_From_Work
initialize(people)[source]¶

This function sets the transport location according to whether or not the Person is commuting to or from work.

Note

This function just sets the transport object to be at the home

Parameters:people (list) – a list of people in the simulation
Returns:None
